goal.ch:
"一、教學目標：
為了提高大學生對食品安全的認知，並提昇食品安全風險分析能力（如風險評估、風險溝通和風險管理等），台灣聯合大學系統結合四校教師不同學術專長，在資源分享的前提下，共同規劃此一跨校、跨科際的食品安全課程，擬以邀請專家系列演講搭配四校教師穿插授課的方式，透過四校遠距同步視訊教學設備，達到教學之最大效益。本課程架構預計涵蓋食物之生產、製造、加工、販賣流通到消費，包括:整個生產到消費鏈涉及的危害(風險因子)、健康、科技、管理、法律規範、社會等層面，再到案例分析，提供四校學生共同選修通識課程。"
goal.en:
"First, the teaching objectives:
In order to increase awareness of food safety college students, and enhance food safety risk analysis capabilities (such as risk assessment, risk communication and risk management), University System of Taiwan four school teachers to combine different academic expertise in the premise of sharing resources and jointly planning this inter-institution, interdisciplinary international food safety course, intended to invite experts to lecture series interspersed with four school teachers teach the way, remote synchronous video teaching equipment through the four universities, to achieve maximum benefit teaching. The curriculum framework is expected to cover the food of the production, manufacture, processing, distribution and consumption of trafficking, including: the entire production to consumption chain involved hazard (risk factors), health, science and technology, management, legal norms, social and other aspects, to the case study It offers four school students to elective general education courses."

outline.ch:
"1.課程介紹:食品安全概論
2.從歷史事件談食品安全與健康
3.食品微生物污染與健康
4.食農教育新思潮
5.環境污染與食物鏈
6.基因改造食品安全議題
7.四校演講
8.食品加工及其驗證議題
9.期中考週
10.媒體與食安
11.食品安全檢測
12.食品安全標準(ADI/限量標準)及風險評估
13.食品安全與風險治理
14.Case study (1)-食油安全
15.Case study (2)- 從牛肉萊克多巴胺事件談經貿與食安
16.Case study (3)-從塑化劑事件談食品加工安全
17.Case study (4)-談食品安全管理未來方向
18.期末考週"
outline.en:
"1. Introduction to the course: Introduction to food safety
2. Talk about food safety and health from historical events
3. Food microbial contamination and health
4. New ideas of food education
5. Environmental pollution and food chain
6. Genetically modified food safety issues
7. Four school lectures
8. Food Processing and Verification Issues
9. Mid-term exam week
10. Media and food security
11. Food safety testing
12. Food Safety Standards (ADI / Limited Standards) and Risk Assessment
13. Food safety and risk management
14.Case study (1) - cooking oil safety
(2) - Talking about Economy, Trade and Food Security from the Cattle Dopamine Event of Beef
16.Case study (3) - Talk about food processing safety from plasticizer event
17.Case study (4) - Talk about the future direction of food safety management
18. Final exam week"
